contents.item: The things we love destroy us every time, lad. Remember that.
contents.owner: George R.R. Martin, A Game of Thrones

contents.item: We are who we are, be­cause of those we choose to love and be­cause of those who love us.
This is what we call love. When you are loved, you can do anything in creation. When you are loved, there's no need at all to understand what's happening, because everything happens within you.
Ok. You fuck me, then snub me. You love me, you hate me. You show me a sensitive side, then you turn into a total asshole. Is this a pretty accurate description of our relationship.
You have to kiss a lot of frogs before you find your prince
contents.owner: E.L. James, Fifty Shades of Grey

contents.item: I was always hungry for love. Just once, I wanted to know what it was like to get my fill of it -- to be fed so much love I couldn't take any more. Just once.
The course of true love never did run smooth.
contents.owner: William Shakespeare, A Midsummer Night's Dream

contents.item: In a perfect world, you could fuck people without giving them a piece of your heart. And every glittering kiss and every touch of flesh is another shard of heart you’ll never see again.
contents.owner: Neil Gaiman, Fragile Things: Short Fictions and Wonders

contents.item: The human heart is a strange vessel. Love and hatred can exist side by side.
For where all love is, the speaking is unnecessary

When we meet someone and fall in love, we have a sense that the whole universe is on our side. And yet if something goes wrong, there is nothing left! How is it possible for the beauty that was there only minutes before to vanish so quickly? Life moves very fast. It rushes from heaven to hell in a matter of seconds.
Spending time with you showed me what I’ve been missing in my life.
The music in his laughter had a way of rounding off the missing notes in her soul.
Don't waste your love on somebody, who doesn't value it.
love, I've come to understand is more than three words mumbled before bedtime.
I have feelings too. I am still human. All I want is to be loved, for myself and for my talent.
You are the one girl that made me risk eveything for a future worth having.

She was my dream. She made me who I am, and holding her in my arms was more natural to me than my own heartbeat. I think about her all the time. Even now, when I'm sitting here, I think about her. There could never have been another.
Love has nothing to do with what you are expecting to get - only with what you are expecting to give - which is everything
contents.owner: Katharine Hepburn, Me: Stories of My Life

contents.item: Romance is thinking about your significant other, when you are supposed to be thinking about something else.
